children.content: Font Handling Issues Test Page
This page tests three font-related issues that were fixed in the Radiant layout engine.
Issue 1: TTC (TrueType Collection) Bold Font
This text should be rendered in Helvetica Bold (weight 700).
Tests: TTC font parsing - table offsets should be absolute, not relative.
Issue 2: Multi-Word Font Family Names
This text uses "Linux Libertine" or "Times New Roman" font family.
Tests: CSS parser should combine IDENT tokens for unquoted multi-word font names.
Issue 3: Font Family Fallback Resolution
This text should use Georgia (third in the fallback list), not the first unavailable font.
Tests: Font resolver should check availability and use first available font from the list.
Bonus: Modern RGB Color Syntax
This paragraph contains a
link with modern rgb() color syntax
using space-separated values.
Tests: color: rgb(8 145 178) should render as cyan/teal, not black.
Expected Results
Issue 1:
Bold text should appear noticeably heavier than regular text
Issue 2:
Text should render in a serif font (Times New Roman or similar)
Issue 3:
Text should render in Georgia, not Arial
Bonus:
Links should appear in cyan/teal color (#0891b2)
